qas.question: Who was oppressed and discriminated against?
What era did this discrimination take place?
Who were "Coloured" people above in the class system?

answers.text: large townships located away from the cities

context: <a1_0>During the apartheid era<a1_0/>, <a0_0>those classed as "Coloured"<a0_0/> were oppressed and discriminated against. But, they had limited rights and overall had slightly better socioeconomic conditions than <a2_0>those classed as "Black"<a2_0/>. The government required that Blacks and Coloureds live in areas separate from Whites, creating <a3_0>large townships located away from the cities<a3_0/> as areas for Blacks.
